title: V6.1.1 (18th September 2025)
excerpt:
This release includes important modifications to Contact and Company creation flows for Shared Inbox (Outlook/Gmail) and Zendesk channel integrations.

These changes were made due to updated requirements. The earlier implementation, while aligned with the original requirements, was found to be unsuitable for bulk CRM data syncing. To ensure scalability and better control, auto-creation rules have now been refined.

title: Article 5: Team Structure to Implement Product Led Approach
excerpt:
What is Product Led Approach?

A product-led approach prioritizes the product as the primary driver of customer acquisition, retention, and growth. This strategy focuses on delivering exceptional value through the product itself, allowing customers to experience its benefits firsthand.
